name: Aolis Engine
short_description:
Trial of Aolis is a game in planning stages. It will be a 2-dimensional (possibly with some 3D elements) adventure in the style of classic games such as The Legend of Zelda or Final Fantasy. It will be built on an engine named the Aolis Engine.

To speak with project members visit the IRC channel #aolis on the Freenode network: http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=#aolis
